LanguageData.ForgingDragonCommonWeapon.label: common loong weapons
LanguageData.ForgingDragonCommonWeapon.description: Enables the production of common loong weaponries, the foundation of loong armies.

ForgingDragonCommonWeapon.generalRules.r.li: subject_story->examined loong infantry's weapon closely during a raid

LanguageData.ForgingDragonHeadDress.label: loong headdress
LanguageData.ForgingDragonHeadDress.description: Enables the production of decorative loong headdresses. Rather useless but surprisingly durable.

ForgingDragonHeadDress.generalRules.rule.li: subject_story->enchanted by elaborate headdresses loongs wear, and learned the making of them from an experienced craftloong

LanguageData.ForgingDragonImmortalWeapon.label: legendary loong weapons
LanguageData.ForgingDragonImmortalWeapon.description: Enables the production of legendary loong weapons, deciphering the secret behind the immortalite, a mysterious material, and the legendary weapons made of it.

ForgingDragonImmortalWeapon.generalRules.li: subject_story->was kidnapped by loongs and underwent three months of "torture", and narrowly escaped with the secret of legendary weapons, at the cost of cracked pelvis
subject_story->tried to infiltrate a heavily guarded loong installation to seek for the secret of legendary weapons, but was found out by four strong loongs and was "ultimately humilated"

LanguageData.ForgingDragonSoldierApparel.label: loong armor
LanguageData.ForgingDragonSoldierApparel.description: Enables the production of loong armors. The body of loong is too different from baseliner to be used by them.

ForgingDragonSoldierApparel.generalRules.li: subject_story->salvaged several loong armors from a raid, but nobody could make use of them and was ultimately melted

LanguageData.ForgingDragonStarting.label: smelts of loongs
LanguageData.ForgingDragonStarting.description: Enables the production of several materials used by loongs, as well as their cuisine.
LanguageData.ForgingDragonSuperiorWeapon.label: superior loong weapon
LanguageData.ForgingDragonSuperiorWeapon.description: Enables the production of superior loong weapons, and taking a glance into the legendary powers.

ForgingDragonSuperiorWeapon.generalRules.li: subject_story->captured several exquisite loong weapons in battle
